meanings.definition: To cover with a new skin or outer layer.
meanings.sent1: The old chair was reskinned with a fresh layer of fabric.
meanings.sent2: The car was reskinned with a shiny coat of paint.
meanings.sent3: The sofa was reskinned with a zebra print for a wild touch.
meanings.sent4: The building was reskinned with glass panels, reflecting the sky.
meanings.sent5: The tree was reskinned with colorful leaves in the fall.

meanings.definition: To give a new appearance or design to something.
meanings.sent1: She reskinned her phone with a trendy new case.
meanings.sent2: The website was reskinned to have a more modern look.
meanings.sent3: He reskinned his room with a space theme for fun.
meanings.sent4: The city was reskinned with festive decorations for the holiday.
meanings.sent5: The book was reskinned with a new cover featuring bright colors.
